caption: Delivery was good but did not like food. Hajji biriyani has very few pieces of real meat, not like the picture shown in their website photo. Taste is not that awesome too..very regular!
All the items tasted good, not super spicy or salty, almost tasted like homemade foods, price very competitive. We will keep ordering if they can keep the consistency.

First time ordering from Sagar At Home and I am super impressed. We ordered from them on Monday evening and received our package via UPS this morning (Thursday). The packaging is very well done; insulated with 2 frozen ice packets and each …

Best part about Sagar at home  is the quality packaging. It took about 2 days for the food to reach me but the freshness was intact. Solid props for packaging. Taste is Good too. I'd say there is room for improvement to elevate the dishes …

We ordered their Golda Chingri (large prawns), hajir biryani, gulab jamun and Chicken Roast. Hajir biryani was flavorsome, fragrant and meat was so tender. Gulab jamun was so moist and soft. Definitely brought fond memories of back home. …

I was excited to order food from Sagarathome. Food delivery was late and came after one week. Food wasn’t frozen and was thawed out because of delayed delivery. I had to throw out some food. Biriyani was disgusting and can tell it’s old. Sweets on the other hand was good. I will not order again anytime soon.

I was extremely hesitant to Order since I live in Northern Maryland and it will take at least 2-3 days to get the order worrying if the food will stay fresh. Glad to say, I'm satisfied with the service. Packaging was good and food stayed …
Excellent service. Food was delivered on time. The packaging was excellent. And the food was truly delicious. Try their hajir biriyani. You won't regret it.

Excellent packaging and no need to worry about food getting bad due to the time it takes the courier to deliver the food. Regarding taste, it just reminded me of tastes from back home in Bangladesh. It's authentic and at the same time, it's …
The delivery was good, but the food was horrible. I think Sagar should just stick to their Chinese items, not the traditional Bengali food. Really disappointed.

Very professional service and of course yummy food. Well packaged and sealed, so that the cooked food stay fresh. In terms of quality and quantity of food, A+. From the time of placing the order and time during delivery, their order tracking system is just great.
Well Done Sagar Restaurant. Just got my delivery today here in New Jersey. And couldn’t be happier with the quality and care of the food and how it was shipped. Simply amazing!!
